scripts.preinstall: rm -rf index.node && rm -rf native/target && cd native && cargo build
scripts.postinstall: cp ./native/target/debug/librust_NAPI_fibonacci.dylib index.node || cp ./native/target/debug/librust_NAPI_fibonacci.so index.node || cp ./native/target/debug/librust_NAPI_fibonacci.dll index.node
